pr_title: [CAM-12382] chore(optimize): add new historic incident endpoint

timeline.message:
chore(optimize): add new historic incident endpoint

related to #CAM-12382

timeline.bodyText: You can consider asserting all of the result properties to ensure that they are all mapped to JSON.
timeline.author: ThorbenLindhauer

replies.bodyText: Good idea, but I'm not sure if it adds a lot of value. I think this would just test the mapping library. I'll keep it as it is if you don't have any profound reasons to test all the fields.
replies.author: JoHeinem

replies.bodyText: It also tests the presence of the properties in the DTO as well as their initialization. But I'm fine either way.
replies.author: ThorbenLindhauer

replies.bodyText: I gave it a try and wanted to reuse the mock methods that are already used by other test classes. However, it turns out to be more complicated so I'll leave it as it is as the value isn't worth the effort imho.
replies.author: JoHeinem

timeline.author: ThorbenLindhauer

timeline.bodyText: Same here, it could make sense to assert all properties.
timeline.author: ThorbenLindhauer

replies.bodyText: See my remarks to your comment above. I'll leave it as it is.
replies.author: JoHeinem

timeline.author: ThorbenLindhauer

replies.bodyText: Ah nice! I have to admit that I just copy 'n pasted the code from the historic incident tests but I like that a lot more 👍
replies.author: JoHeinem

timeline.bodyText: Same here, we can just set the job retries to 0 which is a little more efficient than executing the retries.
timeline.author: ThorbenLindhauer

timeline.bodyText: This test case can be merged with getCompletedHistoricIncidents.
timeline.author: ThorbenLindhauer

timeline.bodyText: I recommend to assert the process instance id here as the test would otherwise also succeed if finishedAfter was implemented as = or <=.
timeline.author: ThorbenLindhauer

timeline.bodyText: This is hard to read. Can we structure this block a bit better with some new lines?
timeline.author: ThorbenLindhauer

timeline.bodyText: Let's remove all the user-, group- and authorization-related code from this class as it is not needed.
timeline.author: ThorbenLindhauer

replies.bodyText: Ooops, I think I tend to get sloppy when it comes to tests 😅
replies.author: JoHeinem

timeline.bodyText: Most of the review hints for GetCompletedHistoricIncidentsForOptimizeTest  apply here as well. Please make any changes in both classes.
timeline.author: ThorbenLindhauer
